author: Linus Torvalds
text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

author: Grace Hopper
text: The most dangerous phrase in the language is: 'We've always done it this way.'

author: Donald Knuth
text: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.

author: Steve Jobs
text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

author: Bill Gates
text: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

author: Alan Turing
text: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

author: Edsger W. Dijkstra
text: Simplicity is a great virtue but it requires hard work to achieve it.

author: Bjarne Stroustrup
text: C makes it easy to shoot yourself in the foot; C++ makes it harder, but when you do, it blows your whole leg off.

author: Ken Thompson
text: One of my most productive days was throwing away 1000 lines of code.

author: Dennis Ritchie
text: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.

author: Brian Kernighan
text: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place.

author: Jeff Atwood
text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, itâ€™s bad.

author: Martin Fowler
text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

author: Robert C. Martin
text: Clean code always looks like it was written by someone who cares.

author: John Romero
text: You might not think that programmers are artists, but programming is an extremely creative profession.

author: Guido van Rossum
text: Code is read much more often than it is written.

author: Marissa Mayer
text: Geeks are people who love something so much that all the details matter.

author: Larry Wall
text: The three great virtues of a programmer: laziness, impatience, and hubris.

author: Paul Graham
text: Good hackers find it unbearable to use bad tools.

author: Elon Musk
text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

author: Margaret Hamilton
text: There was no choice but to be pioneers; no one had ever done software like this before.
